Articles.Content:
So, I was thinking of OPM, and I came up with this challenge: Send a manned mission to go to all moons of all OPM planets, (Passing through their atmosphere, or in Plock's case, fly near the surface) And go back to Kerbin in at most 200 years. Comment if you have any ideas, or if you completed it!

Sorry, Time limit is now 500 years.

Edited June 10, 2016 by Edlu Kerman
Unreal Expectations

Shadow zone would be proud, but not finished, as his Ozymandias (I think I spelled that right) series almost did this. He didn't fly through the planet's atmosphere, and it took him close to 300 years. So good luck to anyone who does this, as the have more brains and patience than I.

here's a link to Ozymandias:https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLGqKphkhc2D3VG9NN6inD5xEeQ1itMyN
